verses.name: Proverbs 17:12
verses.text: Let a bear robbed of her whelps meet a man, rather than a fool in his folly.

verses.name: Proverbs 17:13
verses.text: Whoso rewardeth evil for good, evil shall not depart from his house.

verses.name: Proverbs 17:14
verses.text: The beginning of strife is as when one letteth out water: therefore leave off contention, before it be meddled with.

verses.name: Proverbs 17:15
verses.text: He that justifieth the wicked, and he that condemneth the just, even they both are abomination to the Lord.

verses.name: Proverbs 17:16
verses.text: Wherefore is there a price in the hand of a fool to get wisdom, seeing he hath no heart to it?
